name: Del Conte, Hyde, Annello & Schuch, P.C.
overview:
Del Conte, Hyde, Annello & Schuch (DHAS) are certified public accountants focused on providing personalized service to privately-held businesses and their families, and in our role as their trusted advisor we provide proactive solutions to the sophisticated needs of our clients.

DHAS’s team of five seasoned partners and experienced associates take the time to understand the values and needs of each client. We take pride in the personalized relationships we have developed with our clients.

In addition to offering the traditional compliance services of audits, reviews, compilations, and annual tax filings, we have developed niches in personal financial planning, business valuations and forensic accounting to complement our core services.
